attributes.action: Change the law for animal cruelty
attributes.additional_details:
As an animal lover I find it absolutely disgusting you can cause unnecessary pain and suffering to an animal and only face a fine.

The law needs to change. Too many animals are neglected and when their owners are caught they almost never receive custodial sentences.

Examples include;

http://m.stv.tv/news/west-central/260591-matthew-fleming-in-animal-ban-after-dog-starved-in-cupboard/

http://www.scottishspca.org/news/316_man-convicted-of-dog-neglect

I ask you to change the law. Impose mandatory custodial sentences for neglect AND make banning orders for life, not just a few years.
